DOC.brief_summary: This prospective , multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study . The purpose study determine safety effectiveness human-derived antithrombin III ( AT-III [ Human ] ) supplementation prior high-risk , non-emergency , cardiac surgery cardiopulmonary bypass ( CPB ) . A total 404 adult subject undergo CPB meet study eligibility criterion randomize receive either AT-III ( Human ) placebo .
